column4: Ok I'm using sysv-rc-conf to edit the services which starts at boot. Now my question I want to disable mdam-raid at boot but it has an x under 0 6 and S how do I disable this do I remove all the X?
apt-get install rcconf .... should be in universe at worst... nice and simple ncurses interface  :)
in the future though... just 'dpkg -L <pkg>' to see what a package installed
dpkg -L python-libgmail ... also, /usr/share/doc/python-libgmail for any docs that came with the package...
technically 3.3.3... the one thats in Sid...
thats the goal kinda yeah... they are DD's getting paid  :)
but they are syncing with Sid... which has 3.3.3 ...
